attributes.additional_details:
Resident group give the legal power

1) Terminated a property management company if found to be unfit for purpose.or breaking there own term and conditions

2) Resident  should have the right to withhold   service charges,  until above is resolved.
3) Legal right to pursue the builder  for compensation
4) Property mangement company and builder must declare  any interest in any  company employed or contracted to carried out work.
